value:
$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh! Julia—are you all right? You
shouldn't push yourself so
hard.$k$p$WmMPID_ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Of...of course, my lord. I mean,
my brother. Thank you for
your concern.$k$pBut where...where are we?$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I don't know, but it is a realm far
different from Grannvale.$k$pIf we are to return home, we must
abide by a contract that binds us
here to fight...these people.$k$pDon't worry, Julia. We will be
freed of this contract one way or
another, I promise you.$k$pFor now, we must fight—and do
our best against these foes!$k$p$WmMPID_ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Of course... I'll do my best...
dear Brother.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ah! Such warm light...and yet I
feel that we are still bound to
this place...$k$pPerhaps after the next battle,
strength will...prevail...and we will
be able to return home.$k$pSurely, that's what the future
holds for us.$k$Sbs150|
